about_the_game:
"Loopush" is a puzzle-solving game that combines the mechanics of Sokoban with the theme of time loops. Step into a whimsical realm and assume the role of a delivery worker, utilizing a mysterious ability to traverse through time and fulfill the peculiar orders of animal residents.

Demanding Customers!

As a delivery worker, you'll encounter a wide range of customers with unique requests. Sometimes they simply need you to transport delicious fruits to specific locations, but more often than not, they'll expect you to wear multiple hats—testing new inventions, tidying up after wild parties, and even confronting terrifying ghosts head-on!

Efficiency is Key!

Our rabbit protagonist not only has to handle outlandish requests but also faces tight time constraints with each order. Luckily, a shadow companion steps in to lend a hand! The shadow has the ability to rewind time, reverting everything back to a previous state after the rabbit takes a certain number of steps. Furthermore, the shadow can replicate the rabbit's past actions and collaborate with the rabbit, achieving efficient teamwork that would be impossible alone!

Puzzles Await!

Embark on a journey across the entire fantasy kingdom, uncovering the secrets behind 100+ mind-boggling box-pushing puzzles. Find the tricks and techniques hidden within lighthearted and amusing daily stories to help the rabbit realize his dream life and unveil the mystery of the shadow's origins.

reviews:
“This game is not about cooperating with someone else, but with yourself from a few seconds ago. You must solve box-pushing puzzles that are seemingly impossible for a single person within a limited number of steps. However, your previous self from the previous loop becomes a shadow, repeating their past actions. You must find a way to collaborate with your past self, strategically simulating the impact of your current actions on the future, predicting in advance, navigating through space and time, and seizing perfect timing to pull off mind-blowing maneuvers.”
N/A – Alonso

“Loopush is a Sokoban-style game with an interesting mechanics and requires a bit out-of-the-box thinking. Once you understand the principle it's really fun!”
N/A – chrpa
short_description: Unleash intriguing reactions in the fusion of Sokoban and time loops in "Loopush". As a rabbit delivery worker, cooperate with your shadow friend to complete orders within limited steps. Solve puzzles with wit, fulfilling the rabbit's dream on a surprising and creative journey!
